page.title: 07PLANT PRODUCERS
page.content: THE LARGEST EMPLOYER OF LABOUR IN THIS AREA IS PREMIER PLANT PRODUCERS. THEY EMPLOY 36 FULL TIME WORKERS,PLUS 20 MORE ON A SEASONAL BASIS.THIS FIRM GROWS AND SELLS SMALL PLANTS TO OTHER MARKET GARDENS ALL OVER THE COUNTRY.THEY ARE THEN GROWN TO MATURITY AND SOLD TO THE SHOPS. 8 ACRES OF LAND ARE UNDER GLASS,WHICH CONSUME Â£100,000 WORTH OF FUEL OIL EACH YEAR.PLANTS GROWN ARE LETTUCE,TOMATOES,CUCUMBERS,PEPPERS,CEL ERY,CABBAGE,ONION,SPROUTS,CAULIFLOWER, LEEKS,BEETROOTS,SWEDES,AND INDEED MOST OF THE COMMON VEGETABLES.
